newsitem.title: USA: American States Q4 net climbs despite storm losses.
newsitem.headline: American States Q4 net climbs despite storm losses.

text.p: American States Financial Corp said Friday it reached its financial targets for written premiums and earnings in the fourth quarter in spite of heavy losses from winter storms in the Northwest.
The company reported net income of $52.6 million, or $0.88 a share, in the period ended December 31, compared to $37.1 million, or $0.74 a share, one year ago.
American States said it also posted its first increase in agency-produced direct written premiums, which increased to $381.9 million from $381.6 million.
American States is an insurance holding company.
Its shares closed down 1/8 Friday at 26-1/8.
